div.p: The official URL for this implementation guide is:

description.value: The Cause of Death Condition profile reflects one of the eventually ordered causes of death asserted by the death certifier. The cause of death is initially specified with text. It is sent to NCHS for encoding and returned as a coded cause of death prior to submission of the completed death report. The Cause Of Death Condition profile builds upon the FHIR Condition resource.

The Condition Contributing to Death profile is used to identify factors contributing to the cause of death as asserted by the death certifier. The Condition Contributing To Death profile builds upon the FHIR condition resource.
The Death Certificate profile is the body of the death certificate document. It builds upon the FHIR Composition resource.
The Death Certificate Document profile is a bundle of resources comprising the death certificate composition. The Death Certificate Document builds upon the FHIR Document resource.

The Death Certificate Reference profile is used to enable interested parties to assign local identifiers to the death certificate document. The Death Certificate Reference profile builds upon the FHIR Document Reference resource.

The decedent's chronological age at the time of death. When present, the effective date of this observation shall be equal to the decedent's date of death. Age is derived as the difference in time between the decedent's death date and birth date. When age is less than one day then unit shall be minutes, when age is less than one year then unit shall be days, else unit shall be years.

The national jurisdiction reporting a death event to the National Center for Health Statistics (NCHS). The identifier of the National Reporting Jurisdiction guide uses a numeric value for a reporting State, territory, or city based on the FIPS5_2 coding system.

name.value: VRDR Tobacco Use Contributed To Death

description.value: VRDR Cause of Death Pathway is an ordered list of cause of death conditions. It builds upon the FHIR LIST resource. The source of VRDR Cause of Death Pathway (LIST.source) is a cause of death certifier.
Date Component Absent Reason
The ydayear portion (DD) of the partial date.
The month portion (MM) of the partial date.
The year portion (YYYY) of the partial date.

name.value: Extension - Partial Date Part Absent Reason

description.value: Provides values of a partial date along with the reason one or more expected date part is missing.
The location of the observed phenomenon or entity that is the subject of the observation.
Used to indicate whether or not an address is within city limits. The content of the component shall be a value from the value set Yes No Unknown.
2 Letter Candadian Provinces Value Set

name.value: States, Territories and Provinces Value Set

description.value: 2 Letter States and Provinces Value Set
2 Letter States and Territories Value Set
2 Letter States and Provinces Value Set
VRDR Jurisdictions that are not US States or Territories
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Pregnancy resource profile.
Instance example of the Autopsy Performed Indicator resource profile. This example indicates that an autopsy was performed and that the results of the autopsy are available.
An instance example of the Interested Party resource profile. In the example, Example Hospital from MA is an active Healthcare Provider interested party.
An instance example of a Death Certification resource profile. This example Death Certification procedure performed by a physician on 2019-01-29.
An instance example of the VRDR-InjuryIncident resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Transportation-Role resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Usual-Work resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Examiner-Contacted resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Injury-Location resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Funeral-Service-Licensee resource profile.

name.value: Tobacco Use Contributed To Death Example

description.value: An instance example of the VRDR-Tobacco-Use-Contributed-To-Death resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR Decedent resource profile. Mr. Example Last, a White, Native Hawaiian, Hispanic male born 1940-02-19 and residing in Middlesex, MA.
An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Certificate resource profile.

An instance example of the VRDR-Condition-Contributing-To-Death resource profile. In this example, the condition is noted as text only. This is typical of a death record outbound from a jurisdictional EDRS to the NCHS.
An instance example of the VRDR-Cause-of-Death-Pathway resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Military-Service
An instance example of the Birth Record Identifier resource profile. In this example Birth Record identifier 4242123 denotes Massachusetts and 1940 as the birthplace and birth year of the decedent.
An instance example of the VRDR-Funeral-Home resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Certificate-Document resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Mortician resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Mother resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Pronouncement-Performer resource profile
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Spouse example.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Education-Level resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Father resource profile.

An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Date resource profile. In this example, the date and time of death is 2018-02-20T16:48:06-05:00. The Date and time pronounced dead is also 2018-02-20T16:48:06-05:00.
An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Location resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Death-Certificate-Reference resource profile.
Instance example of the VRDR-Disposition-Location resource profile.
An instance example of a Certifier resource profile. This example is a certifying physician.
An instance example of the VRDR-Manner-of-Death resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Disposition-Method resource profile.
An instance example of the VRDR-Decedent-Age resource profile. In this example, the decedent is identified as 79 years in age.
An instance example of the VRDR-Cause-Of-Death-Condition resource profile.
